author: Doug Bostrom
content:
Thinking of some of the videos I’ve seen of container ships ploughing (they don’t so much rise, from video) through swells, I’m guessing that avoiding a lot of havoc in storms must involve more carefully thought out entry, and an accommodation block built like a bunker. It’ll be spectacular to be on the bridge, for sure.

One thing’s for sure, at least marginally they look better house-foward. And at last, views for the crew. ðŸ™‚
